price: 难道他们不知道吗？在他们之前，我曾毁灭了许多世代，那些被毁灭的世代永不转回尘世。
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: alam yaraw kam ahlaknā qablahum mina al-qurūni annahum ilayhim lā yarjiʿūna
